column7: Concepts, methods and applications of computer-aided industrial design to the design of products for mass manufacture. Rendering and lighting techniques to communicate product forms. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: Concurrent registration in ARTD 202.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: Concurrent registration in ARTD 202.
column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
